segments.text: Is there something wrong ? You look so sad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My house was robbed last night and the thieves stole all my furniture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder you look so upset . Have you called the police ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . But I have to wait .
segments.speaker: S2
